items.titolo: Can these ChatGPT updates make the chatbot safer for mental health?
items.descrizione: OpenAI said its latest GPT-5 improvements reduced undesirable behavior from chatbots by 65%. But usage guidelines remain mixed, even from CEO Sam Altman himself.

items.titolo: Sick of your slides? Let Gemini make them - here's how
items.descrizione: Struggling with a presentation? Here's how the latest Gemini updates can help you polish it, and who can access them.

items.titolo: Come sfruttare Copilot su Windows 11, 7 prompt da provare subito
items.descrizione: Copilot era un assistente ignorato nella barra laterale di Windows 11. Con i prompt giusti diventa uno strumento concreto per risparmiare tempo. The post Come sfruttare Copilot su Windows 11, 7 prompt da provare subito…

items.titolo: GitHub's new Agent HQ gives devs a command center for all their AI tools - why this is a huge deal
items.descrizione: GitHub just brought Codex, Claude, and Jules together in one agentic development platform. Here's how it works and why it matters.

items.titolo: China's autonomous military combat drone powered by DeepSeek highlights Nvidia reliance — investigation reveals People's Liberation Army, supporting institutions continue to use restricted H100 chips
items.descrizione: Chinese defense company Norinco introduced an AI military drone with 'autonomous combat-support' capability to help make warfare more efficient.
